results.content: Quick pace but includes resources to follow along.
results.content_html: Quick pace but includes resources to follow along.

results.content: If I had been completely new to this topic I would have been very disappointed. On udemy so far I'm used to get high quality sound, clear pronunciation, tuition at a decent pace and careful explanation - all of this is missing in this course. Most of the time it's copying and pasting and rough explanation in a short subordinary clause. There's no introduction to the example project at all so right from the start you get the feeling you missed something. I hope this doesn't shed a poor light on Joomla! itself! Unfortunately there are very few complete tutorials on Joomla! development which is kind of a miracle to me.
results.content_html: If I had been completely new to this topic I would have been very disappointed. On udemy so far I'm used to get high quality sound, clear pronunciation, tuition at a decent pace and careful explanation - all of this is missing in this course. Most of the time it's copying and pasting and rough explanation in a short subordinary clause. There's no introduction to the example project at all so right from the start you get the feeling you missed something. I hope this doesn't shed a poor light on Joomla! itself! Unfortunately there are very few complete tutorials on Joomla! development which is kind of a miracle to me.

results.content: This course is not for a beginner. It is for someone who has developed some web pages with Joomla and willing to go deeper into the subject. A complementary explanation on Joomla API is really necessary to complete this course.
results.content_html: This course is not for a beginner. It is for someone who has developed some web pages with Joomla and willing to go deeper into the subject. A complementary explanation on Joomla API is really necessary to complete this course.

results.content: The course is not suitable for absolute beginners. For developers, however, it is short, precise and very informative. That's exactly how it should be :)
results.content_html: The course is not suitable for absolute beginners. For developers, however, it is short, precise and very informative. That's exactly how it should be :)

results.content_html: Very thorough lecture series.... I only wish the videos took more time to explain the steps more!

results.content:
I'm in the middle of taking it and there seem to be at least a few errors in the example files.  I've raised some concerns and looked at the discussions for the last year or so and it seems like the only responses are courtesy emails from Packt Publishing informing me that they are appreciative of the feedback and working on a solution.  It's frustrating to a certain degree.  I only paid a couple of bucks for the tutorial, so I don't feel too badly.  If I paid full price, I'd be screaming bloody murder.   

Not trying to nitpick here, these errors that are resulting from the exercise files are real roadblocks.  They might be easy to overcome if you know a lot about the joomla framework, but I don't think that will end up being the case for most.
results.content_html:
I'm in the middle of taking it and there seem to be at least a few errors in the example files. I've raised some concerns and looked at the discussions for the last year or so and it seems like the only responses are courtesy emails from Packt Publishing informing me that they are appreciative of the feedback and working on a solution. It's frustrating to a certain degree. I only paid a couple of bucks for the tutorial, so I don't feel too badly. If I paid full price, I'd be screaming bloody murder.

Not trying to nitpick here, these errors that are resulting from the exercise files are real roadblocks. They might be easy to overcome if you know a lot about the joomla framework, but I don't think that will end up being the case for most.

results.content: This is a very good tutorial.  After the first 5 videos I was able to make some major modifications to the JoomlaBookkeeping application.
results.content_html: This is a very good tutorial. After the first 5 videos I was able to make some major modifications to the JoomlaBookkeeping application.

results.content: Not completely useless, you can kind of figure out how to do some things by following along and pausing frequently, but it is really more of an in-depth demo on developing one specific extension than a class meant to teach you how to develop any type of extension you want. They need to slow down, explain why they're doing what they're doing, explaining the necessary parts of the component before zooming ahead with the demo so people understand what they're doing, and generally structure the information as a class instead of a demo. Overall, it is not worth paying for as it is.
results.content_html: Not completely useless, you can kind of figure out how to do some things by following along and pausing frequently, but it is really more of an in-depth demo on developing one specific extension than a class meant to teach you how to develop any type of extension you want. They need to slow down, explain why they're doing what they're doing, explaining the necessary parts of the component before zooming ahead with the demo so people understand what they're doing, and generally structure the information as a class instead of a demo. Overall, it is not worth paying for as it is.
